mapper.insert: insert into schedule(memNo, schedule_num, schedule_subject, schedule_desc, schedule_date, schedule_share, schedule_mycolor) values (#{memNo}, #{schedule_num}, #{schedule_subject}, #{schedule_desc}, #{schedule_date}, #{schedule_share}, #{schedule_mycolor})
mapper.select: select count(*) from schedule where schedule_date = #{schedule_date} and memNo = #{memNo}
select * from schedule where schedule_date >= #{db_startDate} and schedule_date <= #{db_endDate} and memNo = #{memNo} order by schedule_date, schedule_num, schedule_idx
mapper.update: update schedule set schedule_subject = #{schedule_subject}, schedule_desc = #{schedule_desc}, schedule_date=#{schedule_date}, schedule_share =#{schedule_share}, schedule_mycolor=#{schedule_mycolor} where schedule_idx=#{schedule_idx}
